name: mern-starter
description: A personalized boilerplate to use with MERN applications. Includes dependencies for multiple features, such as Mongoose, Passport.js, axios, etc.

scripts.ins: npm i && cd client && npm i
scripts.heroku-postbuild: NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false npm install --prefix client && npm run build --prefix client

author: Jofred Cayabyab
